name: The Mansion (itch) (ErenJeager)
description:
THE MANSION

Game made in 72 hours for MagaraJam 5 

Mission

Welcome here Jackie! You must take your revenge. Go inside and kill everyone! Come On JACKIE!

Team(1 Person)

Developer-3D Artist- Level Designer: Eren Alkan

Theme 

You are badguy

Controllers

Movement: W-A-S-D

Interaction: Left Click - "E" Key

Thanks for playing!
